title: His Insatiable Obsession
description: Yvette Rivers, the girlfriend of Detective Kevin O’Neil, finds herself held in the lair of her mother’s boss against her will and she doesn’t know if Stockholm syndrome is at play as she falls for the hypnotizing and sociopathic Morris Gardener. Kevin, her obsessive lover, will stop at nothing to find her but realizes that in trying to find her, he might be making things even worse as Morris torments Yvette at his leisure. Kevin must make the decision of whether he should allow Morris to not only win his bet but also Yvette's heart in this heart-racing saga.
author: C.C.  Miller
